description: Service that returns similar genomes from a given assembly/genome ID. A genome "sketch" is a set of preprocessed data that makes it fast to compare genomes and get a similarity score. This is useful for doing genome searches, where you can find a list of similar genomes from a query genome. This is a KBase dynamic (persistent) service that takes workspace IDs pointing to Assemblies, Genomes, or Reads and returns a list of similar genomes.
name: KBase Genome Sketch Service
organization: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
tags: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
